籤詩版本二:
Ma te raina koura e pauna ana i to ngakau, kaore e heke, kaore he piki, kaore he taumaha
He ngakau tika tona i roto i tona oranga, he kanapa katoa ana tuhinga, he kanapa ana mahi toi Ko Bei te korero mo Beizi he taonga. He taputapu a Bei.
詩意:
Ko tenei hexagram e tohu ana i te ngakau marino me te tika.
He pumau nga mea katoa, kaore he raru.
解曰: Te rangimarie o te hinengaro me te pono. I te mutunga, he rangimarie me te ata noho. Me whai noa i to mahi. Kua tau te ao.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing whakamatautau Douer
I mahi a Dou Yanshan i nga mahi pai me te whakaemi i te pai, a ka whanau ana tama tokorima, i angitu katoa ratou. I hiahia te Atua ki te whakamatautau i tetahi o ana tama, a Dou Yi, ka tukuna he wairua koura i whakaahua kea hei kotiro ki te whakawai ia Dou Yi, engari kare a Dou Yi i whakakorikoria. whenua kia kitea he ingot koura.
(He kupu whakarite tenei korero mo nga whakaaro o Dou Yi, kaua mo te whakawai moepuku.)
聖意: Whare → He haumaru mo koe ake → Rapua he taonga → Kia tupato ki nga mahi → Marenatanga pumau → Whakakotahitia a Liujia → He tangata hikoi tane → He noke hiraka Shintian → He kararehe pumau → Rapua he tangata i runga i te rangimarie → Whakaroa te whakawa → Heke rangimarie → Pupuri taonga ngaro → Tirohia te mate → urupa Jingxingshan → papatahi
古人: Ka whakamatautau a Jin Jing ki a Douer
